abstract: Andy Murray beats Tomas Berdych, advancing to face Rafael Nadas in semifinals at Madrid Open; other results noted.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Murray to Face Nadal
headline.main: Andy Murray to Face Rafael Nadal

snippet: Murray and Nadal will meet again in the semifinals of the Madrid Open on Saturday, a rematch of last year’s final won by Murray.
lead_paragraph: Murray and Nadal will meet again in the semifinals of the Madrid Open on Saturday, a rematch of last year’s final won by Murray.
